sentences: See keeratav voodirätt oli musta värvi.
translation: to fold/turn into a wall bed
to convert into a sofa bed
to make into a pull-out bed
context: The Estonian word 'keerata' in this context refers to folding or turning a bed (usually a wall bed or sofa bed) during the day so it can be stored against a wall as a cabinet, then unfolded at night for sleeping. It's specifically about the action of transforming a piece of furniture between its folded wall/storage position and extended sleeping position.
